title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 683.5 - Applicability of article
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 683.5 - Applicability of article

State Regulations

This Article shall apply to all radio-telephone utilities
operating in any way in New York State except landline telephone companies
which also operate as radio-telephone utilities under the terms of section
645.1
(a) of this

Title. Said landline companies shall continue to comply with the provisions of
the applicable uniform system of accounts for telephone
companies. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16
ยง
683.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
